name: bobvehicleequipment
title: Bob's Vehicle Equipment mod
author: Bobingabout
description:
Requires Bob's functions library mod.

A range of equipment based on all the modular armor equipment available in base mod.
Up to 6 tiers on most items.
Equipment can be used on the Tank, Locomotive, Cargo and Fluid wagons, and the Artillery wagon.
If Bob's Logistics mod is installed, the equipment can be used on all train vehicles added by it.
If Bob's Warfare mod is installed, the equipment can be used on all tanks and Artillery wagons added by it.

Although it can function as a stand alone mod, it is intended to be used with the full Bob's Mods set.
